text:
if this data is already stored in HubSpot you could instead set those fields to be queued progressive fields so you’re only asking for information you don’t already have for the contact.
<https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/forms/use-progressive-fields-in-forms>
if the data is coming from somewhere outside of HubSpot, you could use javascript to populate the  fields then trigger the change handler, so that the react form sees the data
Does anyone know if you can create tracking URLs for mailto links?
For that it’s probably best to use analytics events. Pretty sure you can’t redirect to a `mailto`
